overview: Enter the den of the “Firefoxes” where pleasures abound and sexual delights are the order of the day. Shei St. Clair, Kristara Barrington, Gina Gianetti and Josephine Carrington burn up the screen with their insatiable desire to turn fantasy into reality. A truly incredible experience, only possible in the imagination.
tagline: Hot and Fiery... Sweet and Nasty... Burning with Desire... They're the Firefoxes!
title: Firefoxes
